summary: I just finished watching Spider-Man Homecomming and it was great. And I know I'm a bit late to the party, but this movie was a...
body: I just finished watching Spider-Man Homecomming and it was great. And I know I’m a bit late to the party, but this movie was a gold mine. Mj and Ned are great. The vulture suit is amazing, and I’m glad that’s where he came from. I’m glad he was just a regular guy. I love Karen and I love the fact that Tony gave the programs names like “training wheels” and “baby monitor” that’s just great. I love him starting to give him dad speeches . And I know I keep saying love but what can I say this movie was great.

reblog.comment: I just finished watching Spider-Man Homecomming and it was great. And I know I’m a bit late to the party, but this movie was a gold mine. Mj and Ned are great. I love Karen and I love the fact that Tony gave the programs names like “training wheels” and “baby monitor” that’s just great. I love him starting to give him dad speeches . And I know I keep saying love but what can I say this movie was great.

I love Karen and I love the fact that Tony gave the programs names like “training wheels” and “baby monitor” that’s just great. I love him starting to give him dad speeches . The vulture suit is amazing, and I’m glad that’s where he came from. I’m glad he was just a regular guy. And I know I keep saying love but what can I say this movie was great.

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales Requested by: Peter Parker Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales
Requested by: Peter Parker

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone.  Modern communication seems to have come to an end.  What remains is radiowaves.  People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on.  Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

As he tuned the radio through the various channels, looking for news, Miles heard the end of a series of coordinates.  As the static cleared, a familiar voice sounded, a voice he had not heard in over a year –

This is Peter Parker broadcasting for Miles Morales. I know you are a survivor so you are out there somewhere. This is no city, but its got video games, good people, strong walls and plenty to eat. Also hot showers are a thing here so yeah try to find your way here kid. Us spiders need to stick together.

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

blog.name: vallikesgivinghugs
blog.title: Yellow
blog.description: The colour of sunshine, hope and happiness. -Iram Khan

summary:
Okay so after a bit of advice from lovely people. @ask-the-amber-spider and @paladinmochi123 I have created my Spidersona! 
This...
body:
Okay so after a bit of advice from lovely people. @ask-the-amber-spider and @paladinmochi123 I have created my Spidersona!

This is Angel Spider! A calm and gentle hero that focuses her line of work on rescues and assitance missions. Though that dosen’t mean she can’t kick your butt in a fight.

Her base of operation would be somewhere in Vancouver, Canada.

Now since I physically and mental can’t handle looking at spiders so I based her design off a ring-necked dove! Those dove’s a more of a light brown colour so I incorporated that in her design as well as a bit of salmonish pink because doves have really pink toes.

Now she has gliders that connect fir her hips to her armpits down to the side of her wrists made out of a strechy but firm rubber that allow her to glide across the city sky. (She either jumps off rooftops with a running start or web swings until she gains enough momentum to launch herself in the air.) Also when she glides she’s mastered the downward spike and can easily land at high speeds. Her suit is padded and slightly armored underneath so she can ram bullet fast into enemy from above.

Also here’s her colour palette.
